Question
========

What is **not** a valid reason to include a second categorical predictor (Factor B) in an ANOVA model in an experiment? 
Answerlist
----------
* Better explanation of scores on the dependent variable.
* To examine the interaction between two factors.
* To study the effect of two Factors for the same research effort.
* This increases the residual variance, thus more power.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
